name: RAHUL PUGAL
summary: I am a bootcamp trained Freelance Software Developer, with 3 years of professional experience. I am currently pursuing a PG diploma in Computer Applications at Conestoga College, Waterloo, Ontario, Canada. I Formerly lead the backend development at Playo, a pioneer Sports-Tech startup with 1 million+ users, based out of Bangalore, India.

description.title: Lead Developer - Playo Booking Engine
description.info: Re-architectured and developed the Playo Booking Engine by leveraging a microservice architecture. The booking engine powers the Playo App, Playo's Partner Console and Playo's Admin Panel.

description.title: Lead Developer - Playo Wallet
description.info: Architectured and developed a closed e-wallet and vouchers system.
API integration for third-party booking systems and payment gateways.
Building RESTful API using Python's Django REST Framework.
Product development using AGILE methodologies and version control.
Building scalable web spiders in python.
Deploying web spiders on scalable cloud systems.
Scrapping web-based and document-based resources for lead generation.
Maintain sales volume, product mix, and selling price by keeping current with supply and demand.
Approach browsing customers and initiate a conversation to determine buying preferences.
